title: Police Memorial Bowl V
body:
Police Memorial Bowl V was held on Saturday, May 13, 2011, at George Mason High School in Falls Church, Va.  The D.C. Generals Police and Fire Charity Football Team hosted the Atlanta Defenders in a full contact charity game.  Fallen Officer Corporal Thomas P. Jensen was honored at the event.





  Photos Courtesy of the Prince George's County Police Department.

Prince George's County Police
